1�Use the 3����?Yes.No.
1�Can't we get this thing open?
1�It cannot be forced.
1�You say the reliquiarium lies beyond this gate, but what business do we have inside, Lady Prishe?
1�Isn't it obvious?This is where we're gonna find Promathia.
1�Hey,  !You're just in time.
1�You can help us open this gate.We're almost at the end of our quest.
1�One moment, Lady Prishe.If Promathia is behind this gate as you say, would there not be some powerful seal in effect?
1�Oh yeah, now I remember!I think I locked this gate after the war.
1�Locked it...?
1� , you and Tenzen go find the 3����.It's somewhere in the communion hall.
1�Off you go no
w!�Lady Prishe!?
1�<Sigh>Let us begin our search for this 3���� she speaks of.
1�She is such a demanding young lady. And I believed the imperious princesses of the Far East were hard on their subjects!
1�This appears to be some sort of storage room.Can the God of Twilight truly reside here..
!?�Is this the Twilight God, Promathia...?
1�There you go.
1�But...But this is nothing more than a statue!
1�Uh-huh. It was found by some thieves with more curiosity than sense. Lots of people lost their lives before this was finally brought here.
1�I see. I have heard tell that the nation of Tavnazia had strong ties with pirates and other bandit groups.
1�The Tavnazian Cathedral used to buy up weird artifacts all the time to give its researchers something to study.
1�It all began as a search for the ��Paradise�� of legend.
1�You know, the place those ancient people tried to get to--the thing that ticked off Promathia so much.
1�It is said that the gods sleep in Paradise.
1�The former Tavnazian theologians thought they could go there and ask Altana to remove the curse of Promathia.
1�If the curse of war and conflict vanished from the world, we would no longer have to fear the threat of the beastmen.
1�But as things progressed, the aim of the cathedral's research shifted.
1�As they continued to investigate the objects left by the ancient people, the theologians realized that the older civilization was way more advanced than their own.
1�Even with their advanced culture, however, they were no match for Promathia. Their city was obliterated...
1�So this is what the elders of the Tavnazian Cathedral proposed:
1�What if they were to invite the Dawn Goddess to cross over into our world?
1�Invite the Goddess...!?
1�But before this incredible event was to happen, Cardinal Mildaurion arrived, and Tavnazia was destroyed not long after.
1�Anyway, I found out something that'd give Ulmia's granpere a heart attack.
1�You see that glowing stone stuck in there?If you stand here and do this, you can hear the voice of Promathia.
..�Lady Prishe
!?�So this is the Tavnazian child known as the abhorrent one.
1�It seems she caused a terrible accident during the baptismal ceremony.
1�Many of the clergy lost their lives during the incident, and those who survived told of terrifying dreams of the cursed deity...
1�What truly proves this child's damnation is her ever youthful form.That, and the rumors of her ability to read people's minds...
1�Why does this new cardinal allow the child to walk freely after the cathedral had taken steps to ensure her eternal confinement?And why bring her here to San d'Oria...?
1�According to Cardinal Mildaurion, the birth of such a child is a sign that our most desperate wish is about to be granted.
1�I speak of the treasure entrusted to Tavnazia.
1�What generations of cardinals have hidden from in fear, this Mildaurion has chosen to reveal to the San d'Orian Cathedral.
1�If Tavnazia's treasure is brought together with the holy artifact we hold, the Gates of Paradise will not long remain closed...
1�Prishe, you are a child of destiny.
1�However, your part in this is over.There is nothing left within you...
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Secrets of Worship(pt.1).The Secrets of Worship(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
